## ShaderHelper.resolveVertexNormal() method

Calculates the normal vector of type vec3 in object space

**Signature:**

```typescript
static resolveVertexNormal(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, normal?: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  normal | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | _(Optional)_ Vertex normal input, must be type of vec3, null if no vertex normal input |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The calculated normal vector in object space, or null if normal is null
